meaningMnemonic: A <radical>sheep</radical> that's <radical>big</radical> is a true <kanji>beauty</kanji>. Big is <kanji>beautiful</kanji>, and that's all the more true for sheep.
readingMnemonic: The big sheep's <kanji>beauty</kanji> has attracted a swarm of <reading>bee</reading>s (び). The sheep is so beautiful that the bees have mistaken it for a flower.
